The gameplay is a bit trivial on normal\, but on the hardest mode it is intense\, and forces you to use everything at your disposal. Exploring and scavenging is as addictive as it was before\, and I loved those collector cards. The game is gorgeous and the soundtrack almost brought me to tears more than once.
